page.title: 17DISTRICT NURSE - HANWOOD
page.content: The area covered by the local District Nurse includes Hanwood and Yockleton. She is employed by{Shropshire Health {Authority}between 0830 and 1700 hours, Monday to Friday. She has worked the area for 12 years. She cares for{house {bound patients}including early hospital discharges and the terminally ill.{75% of her patients are elderly. Many of the latter are denied hospital places due to the lack of beds. This places pressure on relatives paid inadequate attendance allowances with minimal holiday relief. Concern at no provision for night nursing by the Health Authority has led to the formation of a{local charity - The {Nightingale Nurses}which raises funds to pay for night time home nursing. The District Nurse noted a greater willingness and ability to cope with illness in the rural areas.
